title: Someone has accessed my account
body: They spent all my essence changed my name and then posted a support ticket saying I was scripting after I logged into my account and realized I had been accessed. I'm terrified now that my account is in danger after spending all the time and money it took to get where I am. Is there anything I can do?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Please Mercy,realm=NA,application-id=okOuNvuT,discussion-id=F6N7KZ9U,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-14T01:57:03.693+0000)
>
> They spent all my essence changed my name and then posted a support ticket saying I was scripting after I logged into my account and realized I had been accessed. I'm terrified now that my account is in danger after spending all the time and money it took to get where I am. Is there anything I can do?

Hey Mercy, I definitely recommend reaching out to us via Support Ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new From there, my colleagues can take a look at your account and see what's been going on and correct inconsistencies on it.

Hello,

My account recently got stolen as well but I tried to submit a ticket for it and got a really weird response email from a "Blitzcrank Bot" that was half English and the other half looks almost Russian and my ticket when I go to the "My tickets tab" has that Russian looking text and says it is solved even though I only submitted it minutes ago. I just wanted to make sure that this was what is supposed to happen and if it isn't, where I need to go from here.

Thank you for your time.
P.S. My name got changed so sorry about the current name. I need to change it back.

while you can change your email, password and send a ticket to riot asking for their help. although they probably wont listen, they seem to find the concept of people's accounts being hijacked as alien.

do this quick before you end up like me with a permanent ban and no way out.
